title: Retrieve a Historic FHL UK Property Income & Expenses Period Summary
description: This endpoint enables you to retrieve income and expenses for a FHL UK property business for tax years from 2017-18 to 2021-22. A National Insurance number and a period ID must be provided. Use this endpoint only for the specified tax year range; for current tax year submissions, use the Retrieve a UK Property Income & Expenses Period Summary endpoint.

submittedOn.description: The date the UK property were submitted, in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ

fromDate.description: The first day that the income and expenses period summary covers. Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DD

toDate.description: The last day that the income and expenses period summary covers. Must conform to the format YYYY-MM-DD

periodAmount.description:
Total rents from property, ground rents and rent charges but not rent-a-room.
The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxDeducted.description:
Tax already deducted from the rental income.
The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

rentARoom.description: Objects holding rents received for the period

rentsReceived.description:
Total rents received from properties.
The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

premiseRunningCosts.description:
Rent, rates, insurance, ground rents and other costs.
The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

repairsAndMaintenance.description:
Property repairs and maintenance.
The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

financialCosts.description:
Loan interest and other financial costs.
The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

professionalFees.description:
Legal, management and other professional fees.
The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

costOfServices.description:
Cost of services provided, including wages.
The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

other.description:
Other allowable property expenses.
The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

consolidatedExpenses.description:
The sum of all expenses for the specified period.
The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

travelCosts.description:
Car, van and travel costs incurred in running a property business.
The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

rentARoom.description: Object holding the amount claimed for the period

amountClaimed.description:
The amount of UK Furnished Holiday Lettings rent claimed.
The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource
